reviewText: And that said if you like all types of horror docs then this is a must buy for horror fans and u know who u r !!! I love all kinds of horror but the slasher genre has become but a classic genre in film and all most extinct as far as that Hollywood machine that like B.S. jump scare movies ala paranormal activity etc. This doc is right up there with another good doc called ...The rise and fall of the slasher film . I recommend this to any legit slasher fan ....enjoy
